original_text: But they are not hurting me. They are hurting themselves, and they will be ashamed.’ That is what the Lord says.
korean_text: 여호와의 말씀이니라 그들이 나를 격노하게 함이냐 자기 얼굴에 부끄러움을 자취함이 아니냐

sentences.original_text: But they are not hurting me.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들은 나를 해치지 않고 있다.

sentences.original_text: That is what the Lord says.
